short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simplify workflows by sharing links to Surfboard directly from your browser. Or sync LinkedIn connections to quickly identify leads.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Weâ€™re all about making your life easier. And the Surfboard Chrome Extension does that in two convenient ways:

1. Easily share links to Surfboard from anywhere

Find an interesting article to share? Just open the extension and choose the workspace you want to share it with. Surfboard will automatically populate a company update with the relevant info.

2. Sync LinkedIn connections to quickly identify leads

Any user in your workspace can connect their LinkedIn account to share 1st degree connections with you. This enables you to crowdsource leads and easily identify who can introduce you to the right customers, investors, and talent.
